page-about.description1: Currently training in web development, I specialize in creating modern websites and web applications. I am proficient in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, and have solid back-end experience with PHP, Python, and NodeJS.
page-about.description2: I also work with tools such as Git and GitHub for code versioning, and am familiar with WordPress for custom website development. I have acquired practical skills in creating e-commerce websites and am able to develop customized solutions tailored to the specific needs of projects.
page-about.description3: Thanks to my ability to learn quickly and my passion for web development, I am always looking for new challenges to improve myself!
